spec_data.Name: python2-django-robots
spec_data.Description:
Django application to manage robots.txt files following the robots exclusion
protocol, complementing the Django Sitemap contrib app.
This package provides Python 2 build of django-robots.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 12:39:57 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Robots exclusion application for Django - Python 2 version
